welcome.title: Welcome to Packsi
welcome.description1: Welcome to Packsi platform! We are a reliable and trustworthy service for sending and receiving parcels through travelers.
welcome.description2: Before getting started, please read our terms and conditions of service.

generalRules.title: General Rules
generalRules.identityDesc: All users must verify their identity
generalRules.responsibilityDesc: Users are responsible for the contents of their parcels
generalRules.prohibitionsDesc: Sending dangerous, illegal or prohibited materials is strictly forbidden

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.confidential: Your personal information is kept confidential
privacy.noSharing: We never share your information with third parties
privacy.encrypted: All communications are encrypted and secure

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.step1: 1. Complete profile and verify phone number
howToUse.step2: 2. Register send or receive parcel request
howToUse.step3: 3. Find suitable traveler or offer transport services

accept.title: Accept Terms
accept.question: Having read the complete terms and conditions above, do you agree?
accept.commitment: By checking the option below, you accept all terms and conditions and commit to follow them.
accept.checkbox: I have read and accept all terms and conditions

helpModal.title: How to Use Packsi
helpModal.paragraph1: Packsi connects travelers with people who need to send parcels. Travelers can earn money by carrying parcels, and senders can get their items delivered quickly and affordably.
helpModal.paragraph2: To get started, simply create a request to send a parcel or offer your services as a traveler. Our platform ensures secure and reliable delivery.
helpModal.paragraph3: For more detailed instructions, please refer to the "Terms and Conditions" section.
